name: Cock Battle - Fist and Feather
description:
It’s not all peace and quiet in the hencoop as you might think. Angry roosters have spread their wings and are ready to inflict each other a mighty blow.

It's time to show who is now the boss in the coop! Besides, don't you want to show off in front of cute hens? This battle will determine who rules the coop. Let it be a real fight so that everybody knows who is the strongest!

HOW TO PLAY:
The game is a battle among roosters. Your goal is to defeat your opponent. Pull his feathers out, peck him as hard as you can and defeat your feathered rival. Choose different types of strokes, deceive the enemy by smart maneuvers.

FEATURES:
- fun and unique storyline;
- realistic 3D graphic of birds’ movements;
- fun game for kids and adults;
- easy control.

Triumph over the enemies in the new game Cock Battle!
